Crimes.Legal_Issue: Assessment of identity documents and procedural fairness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Adverse credibility findings due to inconsistent and questionable documents
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 96 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (identity establishment)
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness for factual findings, correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to establish identity with credible documentation
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing followed by judicial review
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: IRPR Section 15(3)(b) – burden of proof on applicant
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide sufficient credible evidence of identity
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to factual determinations
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of refugee claim based on identity issues
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in document assessment or breached procedural fairness
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA s. 96, IRPR s. 15(3)(b), principles of procedural fairness
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to prove identity due to questionable documents and inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Authenticity and reliability of identity documents
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; applicants had opportunity to respond
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant concerns about truthfulness and authenticity
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of error in RPD’s assessment and procedural unfairness
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Opportunity to respond to concerns about document authenticity
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide verifiable identity documents

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Assessment of document authenticity and credibility
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Adverse credibility based on use of potentially fraudulent documents
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness for factual findings, correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of fraudulent or suspect documents to establish identity
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Submission of documents deemed unreliable or fraudulent
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to factual determinations
Crimes.Application_Factor: Reliance on documents with questionable authenticity
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal of refugee claim due to document fraud concerns
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether RPD erred in assessing document authenticity
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to prove identity due to use of fraudulent documents
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Authenticity and origin of submitted documents
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; applicants were given chance to explain discrepancies
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Confirmed suspicion leading to adverse inference
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about applicant credibility due to document fraud
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimed procedural unfairness and error in credibility assessment
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adequacy of opportunity to address document concerns
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to produce authentic supporting documents
